metadata.name: File Decryption Using Gpg4win
metadata.comment: Detects usage of Gpg4win to decrypt files

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\gpg.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\gpg2.exe'))) AND lower(device.desc) = lower('gnupg’s openpgp tool') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -d ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('passphrase')))

output.summary: Detects usage of Gpg4win to decrypt files
